src/newtonERP/sourceCodeBuilder/ModuleSourceCodeBuilder.java

00001 package newtonERP.sourceCodeBuilder;
00002 
00003 import java.io.File;
00004 
00005 import modules.taskModule.entityDefinitions.ModuleEntity;
00006 import newtonERP.orm.Orm;
00007 
00012 public class ModuleSourceCodeBuilder
00013 {
00018         public static String build(ModuleEntity moduleEntity)
00019         {
00020                 moduleEntity = (ModuleEntity) Orm.selectUnique(moduleEntity);
00021 
00022                 String sourceCode = "";
00023 
00024                 sourceCode += "package modules." + getPackageName(moduleEntity) + ";\n";
00025                 sourceCode += "\n";
00026                 sourceCode += "import newtonERP.module.Module;\n";
00027                 sourceCode += "\n";
00028                 sourceCode += "/**\n";
00029                 sourceCode += " * " + getVisibleName(moduleEntity) + "\n";
00030                 sourceCode += " * @author NewtonERP code generator - Guillaume Lacasse\n";
00031                 sourceCode += " */\n";
00032 
00033                 sourceCode += "public class " + getSystemName(moduleEntity)
00034                                 + " extends Module\n";
00035                 sourceCode += "{\n";
00036                 sourceCode += "    /**\n";
00037                 sourceCode += "     * constructor\n";
00038                 sourceCode += "     */\n";
00039                 sourceCode += "    public " + getSystemName(moduleEntity) + "()\n";
00040                 sourceCode += "    {\n";
00041                 sourceCode += "        super();\n";
00042                 sourceCode += "        setVisibleName(\""
00043                                 + getVisibleName(moduleEntity) + "\");\n";
00044                 sourceCode += "    }\n";
00045                 sourceCode += "\n";
00046                 sourceCode += "    public void initDB()\n";
00047                 sourceCode += "    {\n";
00048                 sourceCode += "        super.initDB();\n";
00049                 sourceCode += "    }\n";
00050                 sourceCode += "}\n";
00051 
00052                 return sourceCode;
00053         }
00054 
00055         private static String getVisibleName(ModuleEntity moduleEntity)
00056         {
00057                 return moduleEntity.getDataString("visibleName");
00058         }
00059 
00060         protected static String getPackageName(ModuleEntity moduleEntity)
00061         {
00062                 return getSystemName(moduleEntity).substring(0, 1).toLowerCase()
00063                                 + getSystemName(moduleEntity).substring(1);
00064         }
00065 
00066         private static String getSystemName(ModuleEntity moduleEntity)
00067         {
00068                 return moduleEntity.getDataString("systemName");
00069         }
00070 
00075         public static String buildClassFileName(ModuleEntity moduleEntity)
00076 
00077         {
00078                 String packagePath = getPackagePath(moduleEntity);
00079 
00080                 moduleEntity = (ModuleEntity) Orm.selectUnique(moduleEntity);
00081                 return packagePath + "/" + getSystemName(moduleEntity) + ".java";
00082         }
00083 
00088         public static String getPackagePath(ModuleEntity moduleEntity)
00089 
00090         {
00091                 moduleEntity = (ModuleEntity) Orm.selectUnique(moduleEntity);
00092                 return "./src/modules/" + getPackageName(moduleEntity);
00093         }
00094 
00098         public static void createDirectories(ModuleEntity moduleEntity)
00099 
00100         {
00101                 File file;
00102                 String packagePath = getPackagePath(moduleEntity);
00103                 file = new File(packagePath);
00104                 file.mkdir();
00105                 file = new File(packagePath + "/actions");
00106                 file.mkdir();
00107                 file = new File(packagePath + "/entityDefinitions");
00108                 file.mkdir();
00109         }
00110 }
